context: The <a5_0>Red Cross Society of China<a5_0/> flew <a0_0>557<a0_0/> tents and <a1_0>2,500<a1_0/> quilts valued at <a2_0>788,000 yuan<a2_0/> (US$113,000) to <a3_0>Wenchuan County<a3_0/>. <a9_0>The Amity Foundation<a9_0/> already began relief work in the region and has earmarked <a6_0>US$143,000<a6_0/> for disaster relief. The Sichuan Ministry of Civil Affairs said that they have provided <a4_0><a7_0>30,000<a7_0/><a4_0/> tents for <a8_0>those left homeless<a8_0/>.
